text: suno! tum log ho, jinhen bulaaya ja raha hai, taaki daan karo allaah kee raah mein, to tumamen se kuchh kanjoosee karane lagate hain aur jo kanjoosee karata[1] hai, to vah apane aap hee se kanjoosee karata hai aur allaah dhanee hai tatha tum nirdhan ho aur yadi tum moonh pheroge, to vah tumhaare sthaan par doosaron ko le aayega phir ve nahin honge tumhaare jaise
